creator: Eilz2PSAEAA
name: Servicemesh - Election events Detector
programText:
A = data('gauge.consul.raft.state.candidate').mean(over='1m').publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.consul.raft.state.leader').mean(over='1m').publish(label='B')
detect((when(A > threshold(0), lasting='1m')) or (when(B > threshold(0), lasting='1m')), auto_resolve_after='5m').publish('Servicemesh - Election events Detector')

rules.description: The value of gauge.consul.raft.state.candidate - Mean(1m) is above 0 OR The value of gauge.consul.raft.state.leader - Mean(1m) is above 0.
